There is an issue with the SideWaffle template for AngularJS TypeScript Controller-As template. It has been broken since Angular upgraded to 1.3. I have been trying to conquer this issue on my own, but it is beyond my Angular expertise.

Here is the issue documented in the GitHub thread: “AngularJs Typescript Controller Template causes problems with Angular 1.3” https://github.com/ligershark/side-waffle/issues/182

Here is more information on the issue, illustrated in a Plunkr: http://plnkr.co/edit/4DWDFh3F4F8n6PHnyTAF?p=preview
